VEC.Q: How many slices are there in this pie chart?
VEC.A: There are {3} slices in this pie chart.

SRP.Q: In the pie chart, what is the next slice in the clockwise direction from slice Oats?
SRP.A: The next slice clockwise from slice Oats is {Corn}.

SRP.Q: In the pie chart, what is the next slice in the counterclockwise direction from slice Oats?
SRP.A: The next slice counterclockwise from slice Oats is {Cotton}.

VPR.Q: Which crop has the largest proportion in this pie chart?
VPR.A: The crop with the largest proportion is {Corn}.

VPR.Q: Which crop has the smallest proportion in this pie chart?
VPR.A: The crop with the smallest proportion is {Oats}.
